description: This Kotlin file defines a custom Android view called MiniBarChart used for visualizing the last 7 days of step counts as a minimal bar chart. The class provides a setData method to update the chart with weekly step data and overrides onDraw to render the bars on a Canvas.

classes.name: MiniBarChart
classes.description: A custom View for displaying a minimalistic bar chart, visualizing last 7 days' step count data.

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Sets the weekly steps data for the chart. Expects a list of 7 integers.

methods.name: onDraw
methods.description: Overrides the default onDraw method to render the bar chart based on current data.
